projects.name: NetFabric.Hyperlinq
projects.description: High performance LINQ implementation with minimal heap allocations. Supports enumerables, async enumerables, arrays and Span<T>.

projects.name: NetFabric.Hyperlinq.Analyzer
projects.description: A Roslyn analyzer with rules related to generation and consumption of enumerables and async enumerables in C#.

projects.name: NetFabric.Assertive
projects.description: A fluent assertions library that performs full coverage on any enumerable type.

projects.name: NetFabric.CodeAnalysis
projects.description: Extensions to System.CodeAnalysis (Roslyn API) and System.Reflection.

projects.name: NetFabric.Numerics
projects.description: A powerful .NET library that provides strongly-typed implementations of multiple coordinate systems, including cartesian, polar, spherical, and geodetic.

projects.name: NetFabric.DoublyLinkedList
projects.description: An alternative to LinkedList<T> with reverse operation and enumeration without allocation.

projects.name: NetFabric.Vision
projects.description: Computer vision modules for .NET and BonsaiRx.
